channel.title: Spout discussion!
channel.description:
Hey guys,
So, does anyone else use Spout? Plugin or server?
If you're now just like o.O, Spout is a plugin/server which bridges the gap between client and server. It works alongside the Spoutcraft client which is a legal client launcher*, and allows things such as custom blocks and extra GUI. As an example, check out the plugins "MoreMaterials" Which adds extra blocks in packs, which can be made by anyone (I made some packs which add staves and runes for a magic plugin), or "mmoCore" which adds GUI elements. I did not write either of these, although I've done a lot of extra stuff for mmoCore (8 addons for the Info section)
Go check out their site, www.spout.org - If you get the client and want to see it in action, feel free to drop into my server as a greylister. You can find the IP via my site, as I'm not sure if I can directly advertise here or not so just playing it safe.
*Sorry, that means anyone with cracked minecraft can't use it. Just man up and buy the game anyway, there are hundreds of more interesting, better servers if you do.

item.title: Spout discussion!
item.dc:creator: @Flenix1 Flenix1
item.description:
@Flenix1 wrote:

Hey guys,

So, does anyone else use Spout? Plugin or server?

If you’re now just like o.O, Spout is a plugin/server which bridges the gap between client and server. It works alongside the Spoutcraft client which is a legal client launcher*, and allows things such as custom blocks and extra GUI.
As an example, check out the plugins “MoreMaterials” Which adds extra blocks in packs, which can be made by anyone (I made some packs which add staves and runes for a magic plugin), or “mmoCore” which adds GUI elements. I did not write either of these, although I’ve done a lot of extra stuff for mmoCore (8 addons for the Info section)

Go check out their site, www.spout.org - If you get the client and want to see it in action, feel free to drop into my server as a greylister. You can find the IP via my site, as I’m not sure if I can directly advertise here or not so just playing it safe.
